plot: Films shot by newsreel companies and army cameramen are featured to tell the story of what it was like for soldiers during World War I.
title: Heroes All
plot_es: Films shot by newsreel companies and army cameramen are featured to tell the story of what it was like for soldiers during World War I.
plot_en: Films shot by newsreel companies and army cameramen are featured to tell the story of what it was like for soldiers during World War I.
